{"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":1,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そ、それにしても、どうしてあんなこと……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"E-even so, why did something like that happen...?\""},{"lineNumber":2,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………。」","translatedEnglishLine":"\".........\""},{"lineNumber":3,"originalJapaneseLine":"「残念ながら……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Unfortunately...\""},{"lineNumber":4,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ないない」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No, no.\""},{"lineNumber":5,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あれはただの凡ミスよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That was just a simple mistake.\""},{"lineNumber":6,"originalJapaneseLine":"「悪い方向で信頼度たけー……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The trust level went high... but in a bad way.\""},{"lineNumber":7,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなたの父は言われたい放題だった。","translatedEnglishLine":"Your father was being criticized without restraint."},{"lineNumber":8,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ら、ランス様ぁ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ra-Rance-sama!\""},{"lineNumber":9,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こら！　行くな、シィル！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey! Don't go, Sil!\""},{"lineNumber":10,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お前まで飲み込まれるぞ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"You'll get swallowed too!\""},{"lineNumber":11,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まずい、ですね……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"This is bad...\""},{"lineNumber":12,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いくら魔王様とは言え、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No matter how much he's the Demon King,\""},{"lineNumber":13,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あの中から出て来られるかどうか……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I wonder if he can come out of there...\""},

{"lineNumber":14,"originalJapaneseLine":"「チッ、仕方ねぇな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Tch, it can't be helped...\""},{"lineNumber":15,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お兄ちゃん！？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Big brother!?\""},{"lineNumber":16,"originalJapaneseLine":"「誰かが行かなきゃいけねぇだろ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Someone has to go.\""},{"lineNumber":17,"originalJapaneseLine":"　親父だけなら放っとくがロッキーもいるしな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"If it was just Dad, I'd leave him, but Rocky's in there too.\""},{"lineNumber":18,"originalJapaneseLine":"「俺が中に入って助けてくる」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I'll go inside and rescue them.\""},{"lineNumber":19,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あん？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh?\""},{"lineNumber":20,"originalJapaneseLine":"『…………』","translatedEnglishLine":"\".........\""},{"lineNumber":21,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なっ、貴様は！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wha-! You are!\""},{"lineNumber":22,"originalJapaneseLine":"そこにいたのは、","translatedEnglishLine":"The one there was,"},{"lineNumber":23,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなた達の前に何度となく現れ、","translatedEnglishLine":"the demon who had appeared before you many times,"},{"lineNumber":24,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなた達を窮地へ陥れた悪魔、ネプラカス。","translatedEnglishLine":"the demon Neprakaz, who had put you in dire straits."},{"lineNumber":25,"originalJapaneseLine":"「今回のこれもお前の仕業か！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Was this also your doing!?\""},{"lineNumber":26,"originalJapaneseLine":"『…………』","translatedEnglishLine":"\".........\""},{"lineNumber":27,"originalJapaneseLine":"『いいや、違う……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No, that's not it...\""},{"lineNumber":28,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今回はクエルプランの暴走よ』","translatedEnglishLine":"This time it's the rampage of Quelplan.\""},{"lineNumber":29,"originalJapaneseLine":"『まるでここが目的地であるかのように、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"As if this place were the destination,"},{"lineNumber":30,"originalJapaneseLine":"　言うことを聞かず……』","translatedEnglishLine":"it refuses to obey...\""},{"lineNumber":31,"originalJapaneseLine":"『だが……クッ、ンククク……』","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But... kuh, ngkuku...\""},{"lineNumber":32,"originalJapaneseLine":"『なんとも面白いこととなった。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"This has become quite interesting."},{"lineNumber":33,"originalJapaneseLine":"　まさか、あの魔王まで飲み込むとは』","translatedEnglishLine":"To think it even swallowed that Demon King.\""},{"lineNumber":34,"originalJapaneseLine":"『大怪獣クエルプランが魔王の力を得て、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The great monster Quelplan gaining the Demon King's power,"},{"lineNumber":35,"originalJapaneseLine":"　どうなるか……クク、興味深い、興味深い……』","translatedEnglishLine":"what will happen... Kuku, fascinating, fascinating...\""},{"lineNumber":36,"originalJapaneseLine":"「相変わらず勝手な野郎だ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You're as selfish as ever!\""},{"lineNumber":37,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まずはお前との決着を今ここで――ッ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"First, I'll settle things with you here and now—!\""},{"lineNumber":38,"originalJapaneseLine":"「邪魔だ！！！！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Get out of the way!!!!\""},{"lineNumber":39,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はっ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh?\""},{"lineNumber":40,"originalJapaneseLine":"「どけーーーーっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Move asideeeee!\""},{"lineNumber":41,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うぎゃああああああああ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ughyaaaaaaa!\""},{"lineNumber":42,"originalJapaneseLine":"ざくーっ！","translatedEnglishLine":"*Slash!*"},{"lineNumber":43,"originalJapaneseLine":"ネプラカスが斬り殺された。","translatedEnglishLine":"Neprakaz was cut down."},{"lineNumber":44,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がはははははは！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gahahahahahaha!"},{"lineNumber":45,"originalJapaneseLine":"　帰ってきたぞー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'm back!\""},{"lineNumber":46,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あーっ！　お、おま！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ahh! Y-you!\""},{"lineNumber":47,"originalJapaneseLine":"　人の因縁の相手をー！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"You dared to attack someone's fated opponent!?\""},{"lineNumber":48,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そんなもん知るか。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I don't care about that."},{"lineNumber":49,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なんか敵っぽかったから斬っただけだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"He just looked like an enemy, so I cut him.\""},{"lineNumber":50,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ら、ランス様！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ra-Rance-sama!\""},{"lineNumber":51,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お父さん！　無事だったの！？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Father! You're safe!?\""},{"lineNumber":52,"originalJapaneseLine":"　と、というか、なんで裸！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"O-or rather, why are you naked!?\""},{"lineNumber":53,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がははは！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gahahaha!"},{"lineNumber":54,"originalJapaneseLine":"　俺様があんなのに負けるものか！」","translatedEnglishLine":"There's no way I'd lose to something like that!\""},{"lineNumber":55,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、あの、大丈夫でしたか？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Um, are you alright?"},{"lineNumber":56,"originalJapaneseLine":"　力を吸い取られたりは――」","translatedEnglishLine":"Weren't you drained of your power—\""},{"lineNumber":57,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おう、したぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah, that happened.\""},{"lineNumber":58,"originalJapaneseLine":"「欲しくもない力だったから","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But it was power I didn't want,"},{"lineNumber":59,"originalJapaneseLine":"　奴にくれてやったわ」","translatedEnglishLine":"so I gave it to that guy.\""},{"lineNumber":60,"originalJapaneseLine":"「へ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh?\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そ、それにしても、どうしてあんなこと……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "E-even so, why did something like that happen...?"
"The trust level went high... but in a bad way."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたの父は言われたい放題だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Your father was being criticized without restraint.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前まで飲み込まれるぞ！」
いくら魔王様とは言え、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No matter how much he's the Demon King,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの中から出て来られるかどうか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I wonder if he can come out of there..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「誰かが行かなきゃいけねぇだろ。
親父だけなら放っとくがロッキーもいるしな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If it was just Dad, I'd leave him, but Rocky's in there too."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「俺が中に入って助けてくる」
あなた達の前に何度となく現れ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the demon who had appeared before you many times,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなた達を窮地へ陥れた悪魔、ネプラカス。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the demon Neprakaz, who had put you in dire straits.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今回のこれもお前の仕業か！」
今回はクエルプランの暴走よ』
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This time it's the rampage of Quelplan."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 『まるでここが目的地であるかのように、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "As if this place were the destination,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 『なんとも面白いこととなった。
まさか、あの魔王まで飲み込むとは』
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To think it even swallowed that Demon King."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 『大怪獣クエルプランが魔王の力を得て、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The great monster Quelplan gaining the Demon King's power,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうなるか……クク、興味深い、興味深い……』
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: what will happen... Kuku, fascinating, fascinating..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まずはお前との決着を今ここで――ッ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "First, I'll settle things with you here and now—!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ネプラカスが斬り殺された。

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You dared to attack someone's fated opponent!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんか敵っぽかったから斬っただけだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He just looked like an enemy, so I cut him."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お父さん！　無事だったの！？

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: O-or rather, why are you naked!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様があんなのに負けるものか！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There's no way I'd lose to something like that!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 力を吸い取られたりは――」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Weren't you drained of your power—"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「欲しくもない力だったから
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But it was power I didn't want,
so I gave it to that guy."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

output_text:

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前まで飲み込まれるぞ！」
いくら魔王様とは言え、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No matter how much he's the Demon King,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの中から出て来られるかどうか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I wonder if he can come out of there..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「誰かが行かなきゃいけねぇだろ。
親父だけなら放っとくがロッキーもいるしな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If it was just Dad, I'd leave him, but Rocky's in there too."

あなた達の前に何度となく現れ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the demon who had appeared before you many times,

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the demon Neprakaz, who had put you in dire straits.

今回はクエルプランの暴走よ』
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This time it's the rampage of Quelplan."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 『まるでここが目的地であるかのように、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "As if this place were the destination,

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The great monster Quelplan gaining the Demon King's power,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まずはお前との決着を今ここで――ッ！」

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんか敵っぽかったから斬っただけだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He just looked like an enemy, so I cut him."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お父さん！　無事だったの！？

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: O-or rather, why are you naked!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様があんなのに負けるものか！」
